name: The Crystalline Labyrinth
description:
The Crystalline Labyrinth

You and your friend find an ancient underground city and stumble upon, what appears to be a treasure room. You friend scouts ahead and disappears for a lot longer than expected. So, you follow him in, only to lost inside of a giant labyrinth.

[ Controls ]

Movement: [ W, A, S, D ]

Jump: [ Space ]

Interact: [ E ]

Pause: [ Esc ]

[ Objective ]

Interact with the gems to change the direction of gravity! Make your way to the open door to reach the next chamber!
